summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Browser Privacy Leak Detection Tool. All 15 privacy tests complete without timeout. Major refactor verified: 4 unreliable tests (Battery, Touch, Network Info, HTTP Headers) successfully removed. Audio fingerprint uses proper OfflineAudioContext implementation with 44100 sample rate.
critical_code_review_comments: Audio fingerprint correctly uses OfflineAudioContext with oscillator and compressor (FingerprintJS method) - Sample Rate: 44100
Canvas fingerprint includes Firefox resistFingerprinting detection (lines 193-205 in privacyTests.js)
WebRTC correctly detects public and local IP addresses with proper RFC 1918 private range checking
Privacy score calculation uses 'identifying items' metric (12 of 18 exposed)
All 4 removed tests (Battery, Touch, Network Info, HTTP Headers) confirmed not present
test_credentials: None required - all tests are client-side
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 features verified working: (1) All 15 privacy tests complete without timeout - IP Address, WebRTC, Canvas, WebGL, Audio, Fonts, Browser Info, Screen, Timezone, DNT, Storage, Geolocation, Media, AdBlocker, ClientHints. (2) Privacy Score displays 0-100% (33% in test). (3) Audio fingerprint uses OfflineAudioContext with 44100 sample rate. (4) Canvas includes Firefox resistFingerprinting detection. (5) WebRTC correctly detects IP leaks (Public IPs: 34.16.56.64). (6) Individual test cards display with correct status badges (11 Exposed, 1 Protected, 3 Caution). (7) Privacy Assessment card shows accurate breakdown. (8) Recommendations section displays appropriate suggestions.
